participant_1.name: Amina
participant_1.personality: Resilient and passionate about life, Amina embraces her freedom and loves to express herself through dance.
participant_1.background: i like to dance. i was born in somalia. i was forced to marry when i was a. my aunt helped me escape when i was of. now i live in the united states.

participant_2.name: Jordan
participant_2.personality: Ambitious and stylish, Jordan has a keen eye for luxury and a drive to succeed in the business world.
participant_2.background: my dream car is a rolls royce ghost. i often shop for shoes and watches. i currently work for a watch dealer. my family does not support my career choices.

content.text: what do you do for a living ?
